page.title: 13Bellringing in Woodlesford
page.content: Woodlesford All saints Parish Church bellringers belong to the Yorkshire Association of Change ringers. The church has six bells and the ringing chamber can be reached by climbing a stone spiral staircase. The team of bellringers meet on a monday night for 30 minutes and before the morning service begins on Sunday. All the regular members live close to the church. My father has been ringing bells for two years,it took about a year for him to learn because of the more complicated changes.
